product_name: Native Eyewear Pressley Reflex Polarized Sunglasses - Women's
long_description: Wow 'em with the wide frames at your next beach party. Your eyes will love the lenses in the women's Pressley Reflex Polarized Sunglasses from Native Eyewear. Silver Reflex N3(TM) lenses block 90% of visible light and 100% of UV rays. Rhyno-Tuff(R) Air frames made from durable thermoplastic material can withstand high-velocity collisions and temperature swings. Cushionol(TM) nose pads and temple boots and Mastoid(TM) temple grips keep glasses on comfortably while you're active. Cam-action hinges let temples quickly lock into position. Native Eyewear Pressley Reflex Polarized Sunglasses for women best fit medium to large profiles.
short_description: Wow 'em with the wide frames at your next beach party. Your eyes will love the lenses in the women's Pressley Reflex Polarized Sunglasses from Native Eyewear.
